alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 7:10PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central North Carolina, including the following counties, Montgomery and Stanly. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 707 PM EDT, Heavy rainfall has moved out of the area, but some Minor flooding still remains possible as residual drainage continues in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Troy, Badin Lake, Badin, Morrow Mountain State Park, Eldorado and Lake Tillery.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
